dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
Coin is an OpenGL-based, 3D graphics library that has its roots in the
Open Inventor 2.1 API, which Coin still is compatible with.
dependencies.name: coin3d

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
DCMTK is a collection of libraries and applications implementing large
parts of the DICOM standard.
dependencies.name: dcmtk

dependencies.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.
dependencies.name: ffmpeg

dependencies.description: Fontconfig is a library for configuring/customizing font access
dependencies.name: fontconfig

dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.
dependencies.name: gdal

dependencies.description: External WGl and Windows OpenGL emulation representation in Spack
dependencies.name: gl

dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.
dependencies.name: glib

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: OpenEXR ILM Base libraries (high dynamic-range image file format)
dependencies.name: ilmbase

dependencies.description: Library for manipulating JPEG-2000 images
dependencies.name: jasper

dependencies.description: Library that reads and writes Generic Tagged Arrays (GTA) files.
dependencies.name: libgta

dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.
dependencies.name: libpng

dependencies.description: Library to render SVG files using Cairo
dependencies.name: librsvg

dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.
dependencies.name: libtiff

dependencies.description: libXinerama - API for Xinerama extension to X11 Protocol.
dependencies.name: libxinerama

dependencies.description: libXrandr - X Resize, Rotate and Reflection extension library.
dependencies.name: libxrandr

dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.
dependencies.name: ninja

dependencies.description:
Open CASCADE Technology is a software development kit (SDK) intended for
development of applications dealing with 3D CAD data, freely available
in open source. It includes a set of C++ class libraries providing
services for 3D surface and solid modeling, visualization, data exchange
and rapid application development.
dependencies.name: opencascade

dependencies.description: OpenEXR Graphics Tools (high dynamic-range image file format)
dependencies.name: openexr

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base.
dependencies.name: poppler

dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.
dependencies.name: qt

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description:
Eclipse SUMO is an open source, highly portable, microscopic and
continuous road traffic simulation package designed to handle large road
networks. It allows for intermodal simulation including pedestrians and
comes with a large set of tools for scenario creation.
dependent_to.name: sumo

description:
OpenSceneGraph is an open source, high performance 3D graphics toolkit
that's used in a variety of visual simulation applications.
name: openscenegraph
